snippet: Critics of biotechnology have long said that the current regulatory system is too lax.
abstract: Obama administration, citing outdated rules, announces it will update regulation of genetically modified crops and other biotechnology products.
lead_paragraph: Critics of biotechnology have long said that the current regulatory system is too lax.

headline.main: White House Orders Review of Rules for Genetically Modified Crops
headline.print_headline: Obama Administration Orders Review of Rules for Genetically Modified Crops
